translations.english_hilali_khan: 1. Al-Qâri‘ah (the striking Hour i.e. the Day of Resurrection).

translations.english_saheeh: And what can make you know what is the Striking Calamity?
translations.english_hilali_khan: And what will make you know what the striking (Hour) is?
translations.english_rwwad: How do you know what the Striking Calamity is?

footnotes.english_saheeh: [1975]- The people will be as such after having been expelled from their graves.

translations.english_saheeh: It is the Day when people will be like moths, dispersed,[1975]
translations.english_hilali_khan: It is a Day whereon mankind will be like moths scattered about.
translations.english_rwwad: On that Day people will be like scattered moths,

translations.english_saheeh: And the mountains will be like wool, fluffed up.[1976]
translations.english_hilali_khan: And the mountains will be like carded wool.
translations.english_rwwad: and the mountains will be like carded wool.

translations.english_saheeh: Then as for one whose scales are heavy [with good deeds],
translations.english_hilali_khan: Then as for him whose balance (of good deeds) will be heavy,[1]
translations.english_rwwad: Then the one whose scales of good deeds are heavy,

translations.english_saheeh: He will be in a pleasant life.
translations.english_hilali_khan: He will live a pleasant life (in Paradise).

translations.english_saheeh: But as for one whose scales are light,
translations.english_hilali_khan: But as for him whose balance (of good deeds) will be light,
translations.english_rwwad: But the one whose scales of good deeds are light,

footnotes.english_saheeh:
[1977]- Literally, "mother" (a man's original refuge) , which will envelop him as in an embrace.
[1978]- i.e., the pit of Hellfire.

translations.english_saheeh: His refuge[1977] will be an abyss.[1978]
translations.english_hilali_khan: He will have his home in Hâwiyah (pit, i.e. Hell).
translations.english_rwwad: his abode will be the abyss.

translations.english_saheeh: And what can make you know what that is?
translations.english_hilali_khan: And what will make you know what it is?
translations.english_rwwad: And how do you know what it is?

translations.english_saheeh: It is a Fire, intensely hot.
